entry.title: Some Useful References of GPU
entry.content:
Recently, I am learning the gpgpu-sim architecture. There are some terms that confused me for a while. Here I find some useful references that talk about the GPU basics in a relatives easy-understand way. Achive and share.

you can get the PDF directly.
